content: आवरण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Covering, hiding, obscuring, obstructing; नेत्रावरणमश्रु <ls>R. 14. 71.</ls> --णं {@--1@} Covering, concealing, hiding, obscuring; सूर्ये तपत्यावरणाय दृष्टेः कल्पेत लोकस्य कथं तमिस्रा <ls>R. 5. 13</ls>, <ls n="R.">10. 46</ls>, <ls n="R.">19. 16.</ls> {@--2@} Shutting, enclosing, fencing. {@--3@} A covering, anything that covers or protects &c.; हस्तौ स्वौ नयति स्तनावरणतां <ls>M. 4. 14</ls>; <ls>Ś. 3. 22</ls>; (<ab>fig.</ab>) protection, defence; शीलमावरणं स्त्रियाः <ls>Rām.</ls>; चरित्रावरणाः स्त्रियः <ls>Chāṇ. 76.</ls> {@--4@} Obstruction, interruption, restraint (of bashfulness &c.); कालेनावरणात्ययात् <ls>U. 1. 39.</ls> {@--5@} An enclosure, fence, surrounding wall; लब्धांतरा सावरणेपि गेहे <ls>R. 16. 7</ls>; <ls>Ki. 5. 25.</ls> {@--6@} A bolt, latch. {@--7@} A shield.
